      • takeOff

        public void takeOff()
        Makes the ship sail away to the left, out of the screen. Initiates an animation and sets isTakingOff = true

      • capsize

        public void capsize(float capsizeValue)
        Capsizes the ship. The direction is dependent on the capsizeValue. Initiates an animation.
        Parameters:
        capsizeValue -

      • breakShip

        public void breakShip(int breakPosition)
        Breaks the ship in half, at the specified position. Initiates an animation and sets isBreaking = true
        Parameters:
        breakPosition - The (x-Grid) position, at which the ship should break
